specific_learning_outcomes: identify types of raised platforms used in a workplace

Love; learner cares for others to avoid injury as they role-play safety practices for working on raised platforms
Responsibility; learner cares for the audio visual aids when using them to identify types of raised platforms in the workplace
pcis: Disaster Risk Reduction: learner ability to identify and mitigate risks is enhanced when working on raised platforms
